summary.span: 表示 的參數及其對 的對應 (選擇性)。

span.span: Represents a parameter to an and optionally, its mapping to a .

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 參數名稱不區分大小寫。Parameter names are not case sensitive. 在查詢時使用 Microsoft OLE DB Provider for Oracle (MSDAORA) 和 ODBC 的.NET Framework 資料提供者的 Oracle 資料庫，使用`LIKE`子句來查詢中固定長度欄位的值可能不會傳回所有預期的相符項目。When querying an Oracle database using the Microsoft OLE DB Provider for Oracle (MSDAORA) and the ODBC .NET Framework Data Provider, using the `LIKE` clause to query values in fixed-length fields might not return all expected matches. 原因是： 當 Oracle 符合中的固定長度欄位`LIKE`子句，它會比對整個字串的長度，包括任何填補的後端空格。The reason is that when Oracle matches values for fixed-length fields in a `LIKE` clause, it matches the entire length of the string, including any padding trailing spaces. 例如，如果資料表中 Oracle 資料庫包含名為"Field1"定義為欄位`char(3)`，並輸入值"a"該資料表中，下列程式碼中的資料列將不會傳回資料列。For example, if a table in an Oracle database contains a field named "Field1" that is defined as `char(3)`, and you enter the value "a" into a row of that table, the following code will not return the row. ```vb Dim queryString As String = "SELECT * FROM Table1 WHERE Field1 LIKE ?" Dim command As OleDbCommand = New OleDbCommand(queryString, connection) command.Parameters.Add("@p1", OleDbType.Char, 3).Value = "a" Dim reader As OleDbDataReader = command.ExecuteReader() ``` ```csharp string queryString = "SELECT * FROM Table1 WHERE Field1 LIKE ?"; OleDbCommand command = new OleDbCommand(queryString, connection); command.Parameters.Add("@p1", OleDbType.Char, 3).Value = "a"; OleDbDataReader reader = command.ExecuteReader(); ``` 這是因為 Oracle 儲存的資料行值為"a"(填補以"a"後, 端空格，3 的固定的欄位長度)，Oracle 不會將當成參數值的"a"相符項目是其`LIKE`固定長度欄位的比較。This is because Oracle stores the column value as "a " (padding "a", with trailing spaces, to the fixed field length of 3), which Oracle does not treat as a match for the parameter value of "a" in the case of a `LIKE` comparison of fixed-length fields. 若要解決這個問題，請附加百分比 （"%"） 萬用字元參數值 (`"a%"`)，或使用 SQL`=`比較改為。To resolve this problem, append a percentage ("%") wildcard character to the parameter value (`"a%"`), or use an SQL `=` comparison instead. ## Examples 下列範例會建立多個執行個體透過內。The following example creates multiple instances of through the within the . 這些參數可用來從資料來源選取資料，並將放在資料。These parameters are used to select data from the data source and place the data in the . 這個範例假設和已經建立使用適當的結構描述、 命令及連線。This example assumes that a and an have already been created by using the appropriate schema, commands, and connection. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcParameter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcParameter/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcParameter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcParameter/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您使用的這個多載時請特別小心建構函式指定整數參數值。Use caution when you are using this overload of the constructor to specify integer parameter values. 由於這個多載接受 型別的 `value`，因此您必須在值為零時將整數值轉換成 型別，如下面的 C# 範例所示。Because this overload takes a `value` of type , you must convert the integral value to an type when the value is zero, as the following C# example demonstrates. ``` Parameter = new OdbcParameter("@pname", Convert.ToInt32(0)); ``` 如果您不會執行這項轉換，則編譯器會假設您嘗試呼叫建構函式多載。If you do not perform this conversion, the compiler assumes that you are trying to call the constructor overload.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會建立並顯示。The following example creates an and displays the . ```vb Public Sub CreateOdbcParameter() Dim parameter As New OdbcParameter("Description", OdbcType.VarChar, 11, ParameterDirection.Output, True, 0, 0, "Description", DataRowVersion.Current, False, "garden hose") MessageBox.Show(parameter.ToString()) End Sub ``` ```csharp public void CreateOdbcParameter() { OdbcParameter parameter = new OdbcParameter("Description",OdbcType.VarChar, 11,ParameterDirection.Output,true,0,0,"Description", DataRowVersion.Current, false, "garden hose"); MessageBox.Show(parameter.ToString()); } ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和連結。The and are linked. 因此，設定變更支援。Therefore, setting the changes the to a supporting . 如需支援的資料類型的清單，請參閱適當成員。For a list of the supported data types, see the appropriate member. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[DataAdapter 的參數](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md)。For more information, see [DataAdapter Parameters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md). > [!NOTE] > 不支援的 Microsoft.NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC。 is not supported by the Microsoft .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫**預存程序**具有三個參數使用 ODBC managed 提供者。The following example calls a **Stored Procedure** with three parameters using the ODBC managed provider. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcParameter.DbType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcParameter.DbType/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcParameter.DbType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcParameter.DbType/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the .
The name of the .
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 而不是具名參數時，ODBC 的.NET 提供者會使用以問號 （？） 標示為位置參數的命令文字語法中。Instead of named parameters, the ODBC .NET Provider uses positional parameters that are marked with a question mark (?) in the syntax of the command text. 中的參數物件和預存程序接受實質參數或參數化的 SQL 陳述式對應至基礎的順序彼此物件插入集合，而不是由參數名稱。Parameter objects in the and the actual parameters accepted by the stored procedure or parameterized SQL statement correspond to each other based on the order in which the objects are inserted into the collection instead of by parameter name. 參數名稱可以提供，但參數物件繫結期間將會忽略。Parameter names can be supplied, but will be ignored during parameter object binding. ## Examples 下列範例會假設資料來源有資料表名稱**MyTable**和名為 MyProc 定義為預存程序：The following example assumes that the data source has a table name **MyTable** and a stored procedure named MyProc that is defined as: ``` CREATE TABLE MyTable (col1 int, col2 smallmoney, col3 decimal) CREATE PROC MyProc (@p1 int, @p2 smallmoney, @p3 decimal) AS INSERT INTO MyTable VALUES (@p1, @p2, @p3) ``` 下列範例會建立參數，並呼叫 MyProc 預存程序：The following example creates parameters and calls the MyProc stored procedure: ```vb Public Sub CreateMyProc(connection As OdbcConnection) Dim command As OdbcCommand = connection.CreateCommand() command.CommandText = "{ call MyProc(?,?,?) }" command.Parameters.Add("", OdbcType.Int).Value = 1 command.Parameters.Add("", OdbcType.Decimal).Value = 2 command.Parameters.Add("", OdbcType.Decimal).Value = 3 End Sub ``` ```csharp public void CreateMyProc(OdbcConnection connection) { OdbcCommand command = myConnection.CreateCommand(); command.CommandText = "{ call MyProc(?,?,?) }"; command.Parameters.Add("", OdbcType.Int).Value = 1; command.Parameters.Add("", OdbcType.Decimal).Value = 2; command.Parameters.Add("", OdbcType.Decimal).Value = 3; } ```

MemberSignature.Value: public byte Precision { get; set; }
.property instance unsigned int8 Precision
Public Property Precision As Byte
public: property System::Byte Precision { System::Byte get(); void set(System::Byte value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用來表示 屬性的位數。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of digits used to represent the property.

value.span: 用來表示 屬性的最大位數。

span.span: The maximum number of digits used to represent the property.

value.span: 預設值為 0，指出資料提供者為 設定精確度。

span.span: The default value is 0, which indicates that the data provider sets the precision for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為資料庫中的值以外的值設定這個屬性的資料提供者實作而定，可能會傳回錯誤程式碼中，截斷或捨入資料。Setting this property to a value other than the value in the database depends on the implementation of the data provider and may return an error code, truncate, or round data. 屬性只會影響參數其是`Decimal`或`Numeric`。The property only affects parameters whose is `Decimal` or `Numeric`. 對於其他資料類型，會被忽略。For other data types, is ignored. > [!NOTE] > 不支援使用這個屬性，以強制資料傳遞至資料庫。Use of this property to coerce data passed to the database is not supported. Round 截斷，或否則 coerce 資料傳遞至資料庫之前，請使用類別屬於`System`之前指派值給參數的命名空間`Value`屬性。To round, truncate, or otherwise coerce data before passing it to the database, use the class that is part of the `System` namespace prior to assigning a value to the parameter's `Value` property. ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定其屬性的某些。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. ```vb Public Sub CreateOdbcParameter() Dim parameter As New OdbcParameter("Price", OdbcType.Decimal) parameter.Value = 3.1416 parameter.Precision = 8 parameter.Scale = 4 End Sub ``` ```csharp public void CreateOdbcParameter() { OdbcParameter parameter = new OdbcParameter("Price", OdbcType.Decimal); parameter.Value = 3.1416; parameter.Precision = 8; parameter.Scale = 4; } ```

summary.span: 重設與此 相關聯的類型。

span.span: Resets the type associated with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行命令時，其中包含參數值、 程式碼可以明確地設定參數的型別或參數可以推斷其類型的值。When executing a command that includes parameter values, code can either set the type of a parameter explicitly, or the parameter can infer its type from its value. 呼叫這個方法，使推斷其類型，從傳入參數中的值時，一次，會重設參數。Calling this method resets the parameter so that it can again infer its type from the value passed in the parameter. 呼叫這個方法會同時影響和屬性。Calling this method affects both the and properties of the . 呼叫重設為其預設值 （字串）。Calling resets to its default value (String).

MemberSignature.Value: public void ResetOdbcType ();

Public Sub ResetOdbcType ()
public: void ResetOdbcType();

summary.span: 重設與此 相關聯的類型。

span.span: Resets the type associated with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行命令時，其中包含參數值、 程式碼可以明確地設定參數的型別或參數可以推斷其類型的值。When executing a command that includes parameter values, code can either set the type of a parameter explicitly, or the parameter can infer its type from its value. 呼叫這個方法，使推斷其類型，從傳入參數中的值時，一次，會重設參數。Calling this method resets the parameter so that it can again infer its type from the value passed in the parameter. 呼叫這個方法會同時影響和屬性。Calling this method affects both the and properties of the .

MemberSignature.Value: public byte Scale { get; set; }
.property instance unsigned int8 Scale
Public Property Scale As Byte
public: property System::Byte Scale { System::Byte get(); void set(System::Byte value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 所解析的小數點位數。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of decimal places to which is resolved.
The number of decimal places to which is resolved.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性只能用於十進位數字輸入參數。The property is used only for decimal and numeric input parameters. 為資料庫中的值以外的值設定這個屬性的效果的資料提供者實作而定，可能傳回錯誤碼，或截斷或捨入的資料。The effect of setting this property to a value other than the value in the database depends on the implementation of the data provider and may return an error code, or truncate or round data. 屬性只會影響參數其是`Decimal`或`Numeric`。The property only affects parameters whose is `Decimal` or `Numeric`. 對於其他資料類型，會被忽略。For other data types, is ignored. 使用 SQL Server Native Client 10 （或更新版本） 時要繫結參數的型別 Decimal、 Numeric、 VarNumeric、 DBDate 或 DBTimeStamp，您必須手動指定適當的小數位數值。When using SQL Server Native Client 10 (or later) to bind a parameter whose type is Decimal, Numeric, VarNumeric, DBDate, or DBTimeStamp, you must manually specify an appropriate Scale value. > [!NOTE] > 不支援使用這個屬性，以強制資料傳遞至資料庫。Use of this property to coerce data passed to the database is not supported. Round 截斷，或否則 coerce 資料傳遞至資料庫之前，請使用類別屬於`System`之前指派值給參數的命名空間`Value`屬性。To round, truncate, or otherwise coerce data before passing it to the database, use the class that is part of the `System` namespace prior to assigning a value to the parameter's `Value` property. > [!NOTE] > 隨附於.NET Framework 1.0 版的.NET framework 資料提供者不會驗證`scale`的參數值。.NET Framework data providers that are included with the .NET Framework version 1.0 do not verify the `scale` of parameter values. 這可能導致正在插入資料來源的已修改的資料。This can cause modified data being inserted at the data source. 如果您使用.NET Framework 1.0 版，驗證 s`cale`的 d`ecimal`設定參數值之前的值。If you are using .NET Framework version 1.0, validate the s`cale` of d`ecimal` values before setting the parameter value. 當您使用.NET Framework 1.1 版或更新版本中，`scale`值超過`decimal`參數的小數點位數可能只在小數位數截斷，如果這是基礎的 ODBC 驅動程式的行為。When you use .NET Framework version 1.1 or later versions, `scale` values that exceed the `decimal` parameter scale might only be truncated in scale, if that is the behavior of the underlying ODBC driver. ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定其屬性的某些。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. ```vb Public Sub CreateOdbcParameter() Dim parameter As New OdbcParameter("Price", OdbcType.Decimal) parameter.Value = 3.1416 parameter.Precision = 8 parameter.Scale = 4 End Sub ``` ```csharp public void CreateOdbcParameter() { OdbcParameter parameter = new OdbcParameter("Price", OdbcType.Decimal); parameter.Value = 3.1416; parameter.Precision = 8; parameter.Scale = 4; } ```

MemberSignature.Value: public override int Size { get; set; }
.property instance int32 Size
Public Overrides Property Size As Integer
public: virtual property int Size { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定資料行中資料的最大大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size of the data within the column.

value.span: 資料行中資料的最大大小。

span.span: The maximum size of the data within the column.

value.span: 預設值是由參數值推斷。

span.span: The default value is inferred from the parameter value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性適用於二進位和字串類型。The property is used for binary and string types. 針對非字串資料類型和 ANSI 字串資料，屬性參考到的位元組數目。For nonstring data types and ANSI string data, the property refers to the number of bytes. Unicode 字串資料，指的是字元數。For Unicode string data, refers to the number of characters. 字串的計數不包括結束的字元。The count for strings does not include the terminating character. 可變長度資料類型，`Size`說明資料傳輸至伺服器的最大數量。For variable-length data types, `Size` describes the maximum amount of data to transmit to the server. 例如，針對 Unicode 字串值，`Size`無法用來限制傳送給伺服器，首先一百個字元的資料量。For example, for a Unicode string value, `Size` could be used to limit the amount of data sent to the server to the first one hundred characters. 針對雙向和輸出參數和傳回值，您必須設定的值`Size`。For bidirectional and output parameters, and return values, you must set the value of `Size`. 這是不必要的輸入參數，而且如果未明確設定的值推斷，從指定之參數的實際大小參數化陳述式執行時。This is not required for input parameters, and if not explicitly set, the value of is inferred from the actual size of the specified parameter when a parameterized statement is executed. ， ，和參數的屬性，可以藉由設定推斷。The , , and properties of a parameter can be inferred by setting . 因此，您不需要指定它們。Therefore, you are not required to specify them. 不過，它們不會顯示在屬性設定。However, they are not exposed in property settings. 例如，如果已推斷參數的大小，`Size`陳述式執行之後未包含推斷的值。For example, if the size of the parameter has been inferred, `Size` does not contain inferred value after statement execution. > [!NOTE] > 如`OdbcParameter`與的`ParameterDirection.Output`， `ParameterDirection.InputOutput`，或`ParameterDirection.ReturnValue`，如果資料來源所傳回之值的大小超過指定執行命令時，會擲回例外狀況`Size`的.For an `OdbcParameter` with a of `ParameterDirection.Output`, `ParameterDirection.InputOutput`, or `ParameterDirection.ReturnValue`, an exception is thrown when the command is executed if the size of the value returned by the data source exceeds the specified `Size` of the . 固定長度資料類型，值`Size`會被忽略。For fixed-length data types, the value of `Size` is ignored. 它可以擷取僅供參考之用，並且會傳回的位元組的提供者會使用傳輸伺服器參數的值時的最大數量。It can be retrieved for informational purposes, and returns the maximum amount of bytes the provider uses when transmitting the value of the parameter to the server. ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定其屬性的某些。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. ```vb Public Sub CreateOdbcParameter() Dim myValue As String = "12 foot scarf - multiple colors, one previous owner" Dim parameter As New OdbcParameter("Description", OdbcType.VarChar) parameter.Direction = ParameterDirection.Output parameter.Size = myValue.Length parameter.Value = myValue End Sub ``` ```csharp public void CreateOdbcParameter() { string myValue = "12 foot scarf - multiple colors, one previous owner"; OdbcParameter parameter = new OdbcParameter("Description", OdbcType.VarChar); parameter.Direction = ParameterDirection.Output; parameter.Size = myValue.Length; parameter.Value = myValue; } ```

MemberSignature.Value: public override string SourceColumn { get; set; }
.property instance string SourceColumn
Public Overrides Property SourceColumn As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ SourceColumn { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定來源資料行的名稱，這個資料行對應至 ，並用來載入或傳回 。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the source column mapped to the and used for loading or returning the .

value.span: 來源資料行的名稱，要用來設定這個參數的值。

span.span: The name of the source column that will be used to set the value of this parameter.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設而不是空字串，參數的值擷取自資料行的任何項目`SourceColumn`名稱。When is set to anything other than an empty string, the value of the parameter is retrieved from the column with the `SourceColumn` name. 如果設`Input`，值取自。If is set to `Input`, the value is taken from the . 如果`Direction`設`Output`，值取自資料來源。If `Direction` is set to `Output`, the value is taken from the data source. A`Direction`的`InputOutput`是兩者的組合。A `Direction` of `InputOutput` is a combination of both. 如需有關如何使用屬性，請參閱[DataAdapter 的參數](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md)和[以 Dataadapter 更新資料來源](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters.md)。For more information about how to use the property, see [DataAdapter Parameters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md) and [Updating Data Sources with DataAdapters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定其屬性的某些。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. ```vb Public Sub CreateOdbcParameter() Dim parameter As New OdbcParameter("Description", OdbcType.VarChar, 88) parameter.SourceColumn = "Description" End Sub ``` ```csharp public void CreateOdbcParameter() { OdbcParameter parameter = new OdbcParameter("Description", OdbcType.VarChar, 88); parameter.SourceColumn = "Description"; } ```

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool SourceColumnNullMapping { get; set; }
.property instance bool SourceColumnNullMapping
Public Overrides Property SourceColumnNullMapping As Boolean
public: virtual property bool SourceColumnNullMapping { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 設定或取得值，這個值表示來源資料行是否可為 Null。

span.span: Sets or gets a value which indicates whether the source column is nullable.

summary.span: 這可以讓 為可為 null 的資料行正確地產生 Update 陳述式。

span.span: This lets correctly generate Update statements for nullable columns.

value.span: 如果來源資料行可為 Null，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the source column is nullable; if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正由正確處理可為 null 的資料行時，產生更新命令。 is used by the to correctly generate update commands when dealing with nullable columns. 一般而言，使用僅限於開發人員繼承自。Generally, use of is limited to developers inheriting from . 使用這個屬性來判斷來源資料行是否可為 null，並將此屬性設定為`true`是否可為 null，和`false`如果不是。 uses this property to determine whether the source column is nullable, and sets this property to `true` if it is nullable, and `false` if it is not. 當會產生其 Update 陳述式，它會檢查每個參數。When is generating its Update statement, it examines the for each parameter. 如果屬性是`true`， WHERE 子句，如下列範例會產生。If the property is `true`, generates a WHERE clauses like the following example. 在這個查詢運算式中，"FieldName"代表欄位的名稱：In this query expression, "FieldName" represents the name of the field: ``` ((@IsNull_FieldName = 1 AND FieldName IS NULL) OR (FieldName = @Original_FieldName)) ``` 如果為 false，此欄位為會產生下列 WHERE 子句：If for the field is false, generates the following WHERE clause: ``` FieldName = @OriginalFieldName ``` 此外，@IsNull_FieldName包含 1，如果來源欄位包含 null 和 0 如果不存在。In addition, @IsNull_FieldName contains 1 if the source field contains null, and 0 if it does not. 這項機制可讓 SQL Server 中的效能最佳化，並提供可跨多個提供者的通用程式碼。This mechanism allows for a performance optimization in SQL Server, and provides for common code that works across multiple providers.

summary.span: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 。

span.span: For a description of this member, see .

returns.span: 新的 ，此物件是這個執行個體的複本。

span.span: A new that is a copy of this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object Value { get; set; }
.property instance object Value
Public Overrides Property Value As Object
public: virtual property System::Object ^ Value { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定參數的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the parameter.
An that is the value of the parameter.
The default value is null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 輸入參數的值繫結至傳送到伺服器。For input parameters, the value is bound to the that is sent to the server. 輸出和傳回值參數，在完成設定值及之後已關閉。For output and return-value parameters, the value is set on completion of the and after the is closed. 當您傳送 null 參數值到伺服器時，使用者還必須指定、 不是 null。When you send a null parameter value to the server, the user must specify , not null. 系統中的 null 值是空的物件沒有值。A null value in the system is an empty object that has no value. 用於表示 null 值。 is used to represent null values. 如果參數用來呼叫預存程序，其參數具有預設值，設定null 預設值為要使用的原因。If the parameter is used to call a stored procedure with parameters that have default values, setting to null causes the default value to be used. 如果應用程式指定的資料庫型別，繫結的值會轉換成該類型，提供者將資料傳送到伺服器時。If the application specifies the database type, the bound value is converted to that type when the provider sends the data to the server. 提供者會嘗試將值的任何類型的轉換，如果支援介面。The provider tries to convert any type of value if it supports the interface. 如果指定的型別不相容的值，可能導致轉換錯誤。Conversion errors may result if the specified type is not compatible with the value. 同時和屬性可以藉由設定推斷。Both the and properties can be inferred by setting . 如果適用的話，大小、 精確度和小數位數也被推斷從參數化陳述式執行時。If applicable, the size, precision, and scale is also inferred from when the parameterized statement is executed. 不過，推斷的值不會公開給使用者。However, inferred values are not exposed to the user. 屬性覆寫`Update`方法。The property is overwritten by the `Update` method. ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定其屬性的某些。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. ```vb Public Sub CreateOdbcParameter() Dim parameter As New OdbcParameter("Description", OdbcType.VarChar, 88) parameter.Value = "garden hose" End Sub ``` ```csharp public void CreateOdbcParameter() { OdbcParameter parameter = new OdbcParameter("Description", OdbcType.VarChar, 88); parameter.Value = "garden hose"; } ```
